mapper.insert:

insert into ST_BOARD_MST (SEQ , TTL , CNTS , REG_ID , REG_DATE , FILE_YN) values (#{rseq}, #{ttl}, #{cnts}, #{userId}, date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), #{fileYn})

select coalesce(MAX(seq),0)+1 from ST_BOARD_FILE
insert into ST_BOARD_FILE(SEQ , MSEQ , ORIGIN_FILE_NM , UNIQUE_FILE_NM , FILE_FLPH, REG_ID , REG_DATE) values(#{seq}, #{mseq}, #{originalFileNames}, #{uniqueFileNames}, #{flph} , #{userId}, date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'))
mapper.select: select a.SEQ seq , a.TTL ttl , a.CNTS cnts , a.READ_CNT readCnt , a.REG_ID regId , SUBSTR(a.REG_DATE, 1, 8) regDate , a.FILE_YN fileYn , b.FILE_FLPH fileFlph , b.ORIGIN_FILE_NM originFileNm , b.UNIQUE_FILE_NM uniFileNm from ST_BOARD_MST a left outer join ST_BOARD_FILE b on a.SEQ = b.MSEQ and b.DEL_DATE is null where a.SEQ = #{SEQ};
mapper.update: update ST_BOARD_MST set READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 where 1=1 and SEQ = #{SEQ}

update ST_BOARD_MST a left join ST_BOARD_FILE b on a.SEQ = b.MSEQ set a.DEL_ID = '_SYSTEM_' , a.DEL_DATE = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') , b.DEL_ID = '_SYSTEM_' , b.DEL_DATE = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') , a.FILE_YN = 'N' where a.SEQ = #{SEQ};
